title: Police Officer On Leave After Accidental Shooting
content:
The incident happened at a home in or near Laurel on New Years Eve. The Laurel Police Department says a gunshot victim was hit in an extremity and was flown to an area hospital. A source says the victim was a woman who was shot in the foot.
The department said on its Facebook page that the shooting appears to be accidental and continues to be investigated.
“The off duty officer involved in the incident has been placed on administrative leave pending the outcome of the investigation,” the department announced on its Facebook page.
Names of those involved have not been released.
Investigators will finalize their reports this week and all evidence, investigation reports, and witness statements will be forwarded to Indiana State Police for review, according to the department.
